files.name: .editorconfig
files.content:
# Editor configuration, see http://editorconfig.org
root = true

[*]
charset = utf-8
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2
insert_final_newline = true
trim_trailing_whitespace = true

[*.md]
max_line_length = off
trim_trailing_whitespace = false

files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# See http://help.github.com/ignore-files/ for more about ignoring files.

# compiled output
/dist
/tmp
/out-tsc
/.angular

# dependencies
/node_modules

# IDEs and editors
/.idea
.project
.classpath
.c9/
*.launch
.settings/
*.sublime-workspace

# IDE - VSCode
.vscode/*
!.vscode/settings.json
!.vscode/tasks.json
!.vscode/launch.json
!.vscode/extensions.json

# misc
/.sass-cache
/connect.lock
/coverage
/libpeerconnection.log
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log
testem.log
/typings

# System Files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

packages/core/.idea
packages/http-loader/.idea

eslint.config.js
karma.conf.js
package-a16.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "my-workspace",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "scripts": {
    "ng": "ng",
    "start": "ng serve",
    "build": "ng build",
    "build-all": "ng build ngx-translate && ng build http-loader",
    "watch": "ng build --watch --configuration development",
    "test": "ng test --code-coverage ",
    "test-ci": "ng test --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadless --reporters=mocha",
    "coverage": "ng test ngx-translate --code-coverage --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadless --reporters=mocha,coverage",
    "lint": "ng lint"
  },
  "private": true,
  "dependencies": {
    "@angular/animations": "^16",
    "@angular/common": "^16",
    "@angular/compiler": "^16",
    "@angular/core": "^16",
    "@angular/forms": "^16",
    "@angular/platform-browser": "^16",
    "@angular/platform-browser-dynamic": "^16",
    "@angular/router": "^16",
    "rxjs": "~7.8.0",
    "tslib": "^2.3.0",
    "zone.js": "~0.13.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@angular-devkit/build-angular": "^16",
    "@angular/cli": "^16",
    "@angular/compiler-cli": "^16",
    "@types/jasmine": "~5.1.0",
    "eslint": "^9.9.1",
    "jasmine-core": "~5.2.0",
    "karma": "~6.4.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "~3.2.0",
    "karma-coverage": "~2.2.0",
    "karma-jasmine": "~5.1.0",
    "karma-jasmine-html-reporter": "~2.1.0",
    "karma-mocha-reporter": "^2.2.5",
    "ng-packagr": "^16",
    "typescript": "5.1.6",
    "typescript-eslint": "8.2.0"
  },
  "packageManager": "pnpm@9.10.0+sha512.73a29afa36a0d092ece5271de5177ecbf8318d454ecd701343131b8ebc0c1a91c487da46ab77c8e596d6acf1461e3594ced4becedf8921b074fbd8653ed7051c"
}

files.name: test-and-build-for-all.sh
files.content:
#!/bin/bash

set -e

for package in package-a16 package-a17 package-a18 package-latest; do
  echo "Processing $package..."
  cp "$package.json" package.json
  rm package-lock.json || true
  rm -rf node_modules || true
  npm install
  npm run build-all
  npm run test-ci
done
